text: @WhiteHouse As of 5:55 pm EST Wednesday April 8: 12,526 Americans are DEAD because YOU eliminated President @BarackObama ’s pandemic team, cut funding to CDC and WHO, and called the coronavirus a hoax early last month. You are a monster. A murderer. A worthless piece of shit! RESIGN!
